data.fullContent: Artificial intelligence, or AI, is the creation of intelligent, self-governing machines. The development of AI has been a huge area of study. Machines have been designed to perform tasks such as flying aircraft or carrying out complex industrial operations autonomously (by means of machines). However, the development of a machine capable of performing in a way that makes it indistinguishable from a human being has not yet been achieved. The most well-known AI projects to date include Deep Blue (chess-playing computer), Watson (Jeopardy-playing computer), and the autonomous vehicles used within Google's driverless car program. AI is expected to play an enormous role in many aspects of life in the future, from the way we shop to the way we do our jobs.

q1.translation: 人工智能(AI)是智能的、自我管理的机器的产物。人工智能的发展一直是一个巨大的研究领域。机器已经被设计成能够自主地(通过机器)执行诸如驾驶飞机或进行复杂的工业操作之类的任务。
q1.front: Artificial intelligence, or AI, is the creation of intelligent, self-governing machines. The development of AI has been a huge area of study. Machines have been designed to perform tasks such as flying aircraft or carrying out complex industrial operations autonomously (by means of machines).
q1.content: Artificial intelligence, or AI, is the creation of intelligent, self-governing machines. The development of AI has ____ a huge area of ____. Machines have been designed to ____ tasks such as flying aircraft or carrying ____ complex industrial operations autonomously (by ____ of machines).

q2.translation: 人工智能(AI)是智能的、自我管理的机器的产物。人工智能的发展一直是一个巨大的研究领域。机器已经被设计成能够自主地(通过机器)执行诸如驾驶飞机或进行复杂的工业操作之类的任务。然而，目前还没有研制出能够与人类区别开来的机器。迄今为止，最著名的人工智能项目包括深蓝(国际象棋电脑)、沃森(jeopardy电脑)，以及谷歌无人驾驶汽车项目中使用的自动驾驶汽车。人工智能有望在未来生活的许多方面发挥巨大作用，从我们购物的方式到我们工作的方式。
q2.front: Artificial intelligence, or AI, is the creation of intelligent, self-governing machines. The development of AI has been a huge area of study. Machines have been designed to perform tasks such as flying aircraft or carrying out complex industrial operations autonomously (by means of machines).
q2.middle: However, the development of a machine capable of performing in a way that makes it indistinguishable from a human being has not yet been achieved.
q2.ending: The most well-known AI projects to date include Deep Blue (chess-playing computer), Watson (Jeopardy-playing computer), and the autonomous vehicles used within Google's driverless car program. AI is expected to play an enormous role in many aspects of life in the future, from the way we shop to the way we do our jobs.

options.sentence: Computer science is the study of the design and use of computers and combinations of computers and other forms of information processing.
The complexity of computer programs has made them increasingly difficult and expensive to develop for companies, leading many companies to invest in simpler software.
However, the development of a machine capable of performing in a way that makes it indistinguishable from a human being has not yet been achieved.
